---
id: provider-consent-webhook
title: "Status Update Webhooks"
description: "We send a webhook for every change in a Consent's status. The status might be:"
sidebar_label: "Status Update Webhooks"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api:

custom_edit_url: null

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Status Update Webhooks"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



We send a webhook for every change in a Consent's status. The status might be:

* AWAITING_VALIDATION: the Consent was just requested and is being validated;

* AWAITING_AUTHORISATION: the Consent was successfully created, and is awaiting for client authorization;

* AUTHORISED: the Consent was authorized by the client;

* REJECTED: the Consent was either rejected or canceled.

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook), with the entity ```ObkProviderDataConsent```.
You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
